text:
Holy moly--this is a painful must-read:
When Will The Planet Be Too Hot For Humans? Much, Much Sooner Than You Imagine. - New York Magazine
<https://apple.news/APLGdosT7Qq68CAFGVJbx_g>

attachments.title: When Will The Planet Be Too Hot For Humans? Much, Much Sooner Than You Imagine. — New York Magazine
attachments.text: Plague, famine, heat no human can survive. This is not science fiction but what scientists, when they’re not being cautious, fear could be our future.
attachments.fallback: When Will The Planet Be Too Hot For Humans? Much, Much Sooner Than You Imagine. — New York Magazine
